page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: Lye is a small busy town with many industries in a basically residential area of houses.From Victorian terraces to modern developments. Cradley is a small suburb of Halesowen bounded by a "Green belt" area.It has a number of light industries and is traditionally connected with heavy metal industry. Another suburb of Halesowen is Hasbury which has a bypass along its southern edge; it includes a quarry from which sandstone was taken to build Halesowen Parish Church. Lutley has developed since the early 1970's into a vast housing development for commuters to Birmingham.It still keeps its rural charm.
